explanations.machine learning: The paper examines the performance of five different machine learning algorithms for REITs price forecasting.
explanations.supervised learning: The task of REITs price forecasting is a supervised learning problem where the algorithms learn from past prices and technical indicators to predict future prices.
explanations.regression: The paper focuses on regression tasks, as it involves predicting continuous REITs prices.
explanations.support vector machine: Support Vector Regression (SVR) is one of the machine learning algorithms used in the study.
explanations.SVM: SVM is mentioned as Support Vector Regression (SVR), which is a variant of SVM for regression tasks.
explanations.neural network: Long/Short-Term Memory Neural Networks (LSTM) are used in the study, which are a type of neural network.
explanations.deep learning: LSTM networks are a type of deep learning model, indicating the use of deep learning in the study.
explanations.long short-term memory: Long/Short-Term Memory Neural Networks (LSTM) are explicitly mentioned as one of the algorithms used for REITs price forecasting.
explanations.LSTM: LSTM is the abbreviation for Long Short-Term Memory, which is used in the study for time series prediction.
